EmailTemplate.name: MX 2013 - Christmas Travel Insurance
EmailTemplate.subject: MX 2013 Christmas - Travel Insurance Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Hope you had an awesome weekend!
Could you please provide me with the following information about your Travel Medical Insurance:
Travel Insurance Provider: Policy #: Policy Name (if applicable): Policy Phone #1: Policy Phone #2:
If you do not have any Travel Medical Insurance coverage through your parents, school, or work, than you can purchase this online.
Here is a great website to compare prices: http://www.insuremytrip.com
Please let me know if you have any other questions.
See you soon!
